cheatsheet.title: Getting started with TOP20 self assessments

intro.description:
Welcome to verinice TOP20 self assessments!
This tutorial will help you to conduct your first TOP20 self assessment!

item.title: Create a new self assessment
item.description:
First you have to create a new self assessment. You should be in the self assessment perspective. If not, you can go there by choosing from the menu: View -> Show Perspective... -> Self-Assessment Perspective.
You will find the Self-Assessment view on left side of the Window.

item.title: Create a new self-assessment
item.description:
Click the NEW button in the self-assessment view or choose from the menu: File -> Add new Self-Assessment
The new self-assessment will appear in the view. Double-click on it to change the name from "My Company" to your actual company's name.

item.title: Open the first category
item.description:
Now it's time to start the self-assessment. The top node should already be expanded. If it isn't please do so now. You should be able to see a number of categories from "Security Policy" to "Access Control". These categories contain questions that will help you to evaluate your current information security level for the most important topics.
Expand the first category by clicking the expand-icon to the left of it.
